mapper.select: SELECT f.floorNum, floorName, f.spotCode, spotName FROM floor f JOIN spot s ON f.spotCode=s.spotCode WHERE f.spotCode=#{spotCode} ORDER BY f.floorNum
SELECT passCode, passName,TO_CHAR(passdate,'YYYY-MM-DD hh24:mi') passDate, price FROM pass

SELECT placeCode, placement, created, isPlaceUsed, p.floorNum,spotname,floorname FROM placement p join floor f on f.FLOORNUM=p.floornum join spot s on f.spotcode=s.spotcode WHERE p.isPlaceUsed=1 and p.floorNum=#{floorNum}

SELECT p.placecode,floornum,s.seatcode,TO_DATE(enddate,'YYYY-MM-DD-hh24-mi') enddate, TO_DATE(startdate,'YYYY-MM-DD-hh24-mi') startdate,stresnum,reservnum, seatname FROM placement p JOIN seat s on s.placecode=p.placecode JOIN stres sr ON sr.seatcode=s.seatcode WHERE ISPLACEUSED=1 and isUsed=1 and floornum=#{floorNum} AND ((startdate BETWEEN TO_DATE(#{startTime},'YYYY/MM/DD hh24:mi') AND TO_DATE(#{endTime},'YYYY/MM/DD hh24:mi')) OR (enddate BETWEEN TO_DATE(#{startTime},'YYYY/MM/DD hh24:mi') AND TO_DATE(#{endTime},'YYYY/MM/DD hh24:mi')))
SELECT seatcode FROM seat WHERE placeCode=#{placeCode} and isUsed=1 and seatName=#{seatName}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO stres (stresnum,startDate, endDate, reservnum,seatCode, passCode) VALUES (SEQ_STRES.NEXTVAL, to_date(#{startDate},'yyyy-mm-dd hh24-mi-ss'),to_date(#{endDate},'yyyy-mm-dd hh24-mi-ss'), #{reservNum}, #{seatCode}, #{passCode})
